document.full_text: second seed novak djokovic got a walkover into the french open semi-finals after last eight opponent fabio fognini pulled out monday because of injury.
document.title: djokovic into last four as fognini quits
lines_and_colors: second seed novak djokovic got a walkover into the french open semi-finals after last eight opponent fabio fognini pulled out monday because of injury.
